title: Easy on the Eyes - David Ryan Harris + Scary Pockets
description:
TWO THINGS - 
1 - Join the vinyl club tier by September 30 to get "Jeff" on vinyl! http://patreon.com/scarypockets
2 - Get tickets to see us on tour! https://www.scarypocketsfunk.com

A live funk version of David Ryan Harris' "Easy on the Eyes" with Scary Pockets.

MUSICIAN CREDITS
Vocals: David Ryan Harris
Guitar: Ryan Lerman
Bass: Sean Hurley
Organ: Larry Goldings
Keys: Charles Jones
Drums: Lemar Carter

AUDIO CREDITS

VIDEO CREDITS

Recorded LIVE at The Village Studios in Los Angeles, CA.
